short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to change notification settings to all your YouTube Channels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notify All YouTube - Bulk Manage Your YouTube Notifications!

Tired of manually adjusting notification settings for all your YouTube subscriptions? Notify All YouTube is here to help!

With just a few clicks, you can bulk-update your notification preferences for every channel you’re subscribed to. The free version allows you to change settings for up to 10 channels at once, while the premium version gives you unlimited control – no limits, no hassle!

How it works:

1. Open the extension and click "Start."
2. It automatically opens your subscriptions list.
3. The process begins, making it easy to manage notifications.
4. Free users can adjust up to 10 channels at a time, while premium users can update them all in one go!

Take control of your YouTube notifications and never miss an important update again!

Install Notify All YouTube now and streamline your subscriptions today!
